full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offers: Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil

## Solicitation Reference Number: WS4006758308

## Description
This Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) is a solicitation for National Master Standing Offers (NMSO) for Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil. The requirements are in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board (CGSB) standards.

## Scope
The solicitation is open to all qualified suppliers who wish to provide diesel fuel, automotive gasoline, and heating fuel oil to the Government of Canada on an as-and-when-requested basis from May 1, 2024, to August 31, 2025.

## Delivery Locations
Delivery locations will be in various parts of Canada, including Quebec (except NCR), Northwest Territories, Newfoundland and Labrador, Saskatchewan, New Brunswick, National Capital Region (NCR), Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, Alberta, British Columbia, Yukon, Indigenous Lands, Manitoba, and Ontario (except NCR).

## Notice of Expression of Interest
The tender notice was published on March 19, 2024, and the solicitation closing date is April 15, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Time.

## Purpose
The purpose of this solicitation is to establish a list of qualified suppliers who can provide the required products to the Government of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Expression of Interest
To express interest and obtain detailed information about the tender process, potential suppliers should contact the Procurement Entity:

Lacelle, Ann (SPAC/PSPC)
ann.lacelle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19148547?extsite=MTkxNDg1NDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Official Languages
The documents may be presented in either English or French. Requests for the tender documents should be made to the Procurement Entity.

## Pre-Qualification
Suppliers who wish to pre-qualify must register their company on the Bidder Registration Form.

## Response Documents
Tender documents will be available upon request from the Procurement Entity. The electronic response file will be available to suppliers who have obtained a copy of the technical document package.

## Submission
Bidders must submit electronically by the submission deadline. Paper submissions will not be accepted.
